name: Mayor's Office of Housing & Community Development
description: - Need help paying rent and utilities in San Francisco because of COVID-19? Apply for the San Francisco Emergency Rental Assistance Program. - Check out the city's homeownership programs. They offer low-interest loans for low to moderate income first-time home buyers and below-market rate rental opportunities. Visit their website for affordable housing options.

address: 1 South Van Ness Avenue, San Francisco, CA, 94103
